string.name: whats_new_text
string.translation_description: Description of new features in this version in html. Please do not change the < and > markup

resources.string:
New in version %s

  • Possible fix for upside down labels on some devices with missing sensors.
  • Improved location permission dialog

Support Sky Map

Sky Map is free and open source. If you find it useful, please consider supporting development at our GitHub page.
